event.title: 11/13 "FREE LADIES NIGHT" International Party Tokyo @ CLUB MAHARAJA Roppongi * All-You-Can-Drink
event.description:
下記の日本語をご覧下さい On Friday, November 13, we invite you to meet lots of international people and make new friends, while enjoying All-You-Can-Drink at CLUB MAHARAJA in Roppongi.

1000 Yen OFF with reservation at:
11/12 AfterWorkChillOut @GREENLAND/MIST http://www.tokyoparty.org/party.php?lang=en&p=afterworkget2gether -
11/13 LadiesFREE @Roppongi http://www.tokyoparty.org/party.php?lang=en&p=free_ladies_night -
11/14 NEW Shibuya @ ONE OAK http://www.tokyoparty.org/party.php?lang=en&p=tokyointernationalparty -
11/17 AfterWorkChillOut @KITSUNE http://www.tokyoparty.org/party.php?lang=en&p=chillout_zone -
Japanese Guys: 2000 Yen
Foreign Guys*: 1000 Yen
Japanese Girls: FREE!! (limited time promotional offer)
Foreign Girls: FREE!! (limited time promotional offer)
Birthday Present*: FREE Admission, if your birthday is in November.

- Practice you Japanese skills with native speakers.
- Get your magic All-You-Can-Drink wristband for only 1000 Yen extra!!!
- Great Opportunity to expand your social network of friends in the city
- All-You-Can-Drink Cocktails, Beer, Softdrinks etc.
- Find new friends and have a great time at a cool international club.
- The party is what you make it!!!

11/12(Thu) “AfterWorkGet2Gather” Intl. Party Tokyo @ GREENLAND “MIST” Roppongi
http://www.tokyoparty.org/party.php?lang=en&p=afterworkget2gether

http://www.tokyoparty.org/party.php?lang=en&p=publicviewing

http://www.tokyoparty.org/party.php?lang=en&p=free_ladies_night

11/14(Sat) NEW Shibuya International Party @ ONE OAK TOKYO
http://www.tokyoparty.org/party.php?lang=en&p=tokyointernationalparty

11/17(Tue) “AfterWorkChillOut” Tokyo International Party @ KITSUNE Shibuya
http://www.tokyoparty.org/party.php?lang=en&p=chillout_zone

11/17(Tue) JAPAN vs CAMBODIA LIVE Public Viewing Tokyo @ KITSUNE Shibuya
http://www.tokyoparty.org/party.php?lang=en&p=public_viewing

11/20(Fri) Tokyo International Party @ GREENLAND “MIST” Roppongi
http://www.tokyoparty.org/party.php?lang=en&p=roppongiparty

11/21(Sat) NEW Intl. Friends Party @ CLUB AGEPA Shibuya
http://www.tokyoparty.org/party.php?lang=en&p=internationalparty

11/28(Sat) NEW Shibuya International Party @ KITSUNE
http://www.tokyoparty.org/party.php?lang=en&p=internationalfriendsparty

Good News!!! We have reached 5000 Facebook Fans and will update you about the date of our FREE Facebook Party for all of our fans very soon!!! In case you haven’t clicked “Like” yet, you can still do so now in order to get a FREE Admission ticket for the upcoming Facebook Party.
http://www.facebook.com/TokyoInfo

Everybody is welcome, so tell your friends and join us.

TokyoInfo

http://www.Tokyo.Info
http://www.facebook.com/TokyoInfo
http://www.twitter.com/TokyoInfo

Get a FREE PARTY TICKET from our Partner Dropbox!!!
Sign up for a FREE account at http://www.tokyo.info/dropbox4free and send us an email when you are done.
After we confirm your account, we will send you a FREE ticket and you can join our next party completely FREE of Charge!!!
-
11月13日（金）、六本木のCLUB MAHARAJAにて国際交流パーティーを開催します。　海外から来た人たちとの出会いを通じて新しい友人作りや語学のスキルアップ、そして特別な誰かに出会うチャンスの時！！

こちらからの予約で1000円OFF！！
11/12 AfterWorkGet2Gather @GREENLAND/MIST http://www.tokyoparty.org/party.php?p=afterworkget2gether -
11/12 日本 vs シンガポール LIVE @六本木 http://www.tokyoparty.org/party.php?p=publicviewing -
11/13 LadiesFREE @六本木 http://www.tokyoparty.org/party.php?p=free_ladies_night -
11/14 NEW 渋谷 @ONE OAK http://www.tokyoparty.org/party.php?p=tokyointernationalparty -
11/17 AfterWorkChillOut @KITSUNE http://www.tokyoparty.org/party.php?p=chillout_zone -
男性： 2000円
女性： 入場無料!! （期間限定スペシャル）
誕生日プレゼント： 11月が誕生日の方は入場無料になります。

- 毎回、たくさんの外国人が、東京の最高な国際交流パーティーに参加しています!
- ネーティブスピーカーと話して英語をもっとぺらぺらになりましょう！！
- 国際交流して新しい友達、ランゲージエクスチェンジのパートナーを探そう！
- 2杯以上飲みたい方は、1000円で飲み放題リストバンドをお求めください!!!
- 留学した人との情報交換もして、外人の友達を増やしましょう！！
- 飲み放題 ビール、カクテル、ジュース等
- お友達同士、VIPラウンジでお寛ぎ下さい！

11/12（木） “AfterWorkGet2Gather” 国際交流パーティー 東京 @ GREENLAND “MIST” 六本木
